<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anticipate Ambush](/Feats.aspx?ID=4941) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 172 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You keep watch for any hidden creatures or dangerous sites, moving at half your travel Speed. If you’re Anticipating an Ambush at the start of an encounter, you roll a Perception check for initiative, and all enemies rolling Stealth for initiative take a –2 circumstance penalty to their Stealth checks.
name: Anticipate Ambush
